text:
Quote of the Day 

Everything you can imagine is real. 
Pablo Picasso     

Tweet of the Day WRONG answer! You're FIRED! #OverreactIn4Words — Ronald Guillemette (@raguillem) April 16, 2017 Image of the Day 

Busting Myths About Capitalism 

Ron Paul & the Promise of Peace 

Facebook Corner 
(National Review).  "It took Obama 10 months to decide what to do in Afghanistan. It took Trump 63 hours to make Assad pay for his chemical-weapons duplicity." -- Charles Krauthammer 
Ronald A Guillemette   Krauthammer is a pedestrian neo-con. Trump's unconstitutional attack of Syria was grossly ineffective: he didn't take out Syria's air force; he didn't take out chemical plants. Trump make a knee-jerk decision, contrary to what he said about Obama under similar circumstances years earlier. He did not consult with Congress--something even Obama paid lip service to on Syria. This was an impeachable act. We are over $20T in debt; we cannot afford to be the world's policeman. 

(Pto-Life Libertarians).  You don't have a right to choose murder . 
Ronald A Guillemette   Her right to choose Planned Parenthood is not controlled by the government but by the market. The singling out of particular organizations for special-interest benefit is corruption of our form of government and a violation of the rule of law. If Planned Parenthood's business model is not viable, we have no business propping it up. 
Cool Technology 


Groom Has a Surprise For His Bride On Their First Dance
